biotools.summary: Dune is an R Package that provides a parameter-free method for optimizing the trade-off between the resolutionof the clusters and their replicability across datasets. Dune method takes as input a set of clustering results on a dataset, and iteratively merges clusters within those clusterings in order to maximize their concordance.

bioschemas.name: Dune
